question_text:
Question 29 
 
  
[Computer Network (Transport Layer)]
TCP client 
P 
successfully establishes a connection to TCP server 
Q
. Let 
P
N
  denote the sequence number
in the SYN sent from 
P
  to 
Q
. Let 
Q
N
  denote the acknowledge number in the SYN ACK from 
Q
  to 
P
.
Which of the following statements is/are CORRECT ?
(A) The sequence number 
P
N
  is chosen randomly by P
(B) The sequence number 
P
N
  is always 0 for a new connection.
(C) The acknowledge number 
Q
N
  is equal to 
P
N
(D) The acknowledge number 
Q
N
  is equal to 
1
P
N
 
explanation_text:
Sol.
 
 
1
q
p
N
N


Where, 
p
N
  is chosen randomly to prevent some kind of attacks.
Hence, the correct option (A) and (D).
